Fall Apart LyricsHow long
Is never again
You're floating away
You're holding me down

This part
Don't throw it away
It's keepin the heat
But its gonna give out
Forever
All I want
Is to let it fall apart

Talkin
Never did me good
Such a simple machine
Breaks just like the heart
You start
What you cannot end
No button to push
No easy way out
But I need
What you're givin to me
Don't blow me away
Cuz I'm already gone

Holding on
Is the hardest thing to start
Holding on
Is the hardest thing to stopYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.title: Dance II
search_results.lyrics:
Dance II Lyrics[Verse 1]
I'm only doing the best I can
I got the shadow but lost the heart
I tried to keep it I tried to sleep
I tried to dance with it in the dark

[Chorus]
I need you uh-huh
Don't matter what you got
If you can't get free
Your lips can smile
But your eyes still lie
[Verse 2]
And when you hold me so close I bleed
Your arms are soft as the sharpest knife
But when you told me that you would leave
I think I nearly lost my mind

[Bridge]
Now I don't know what to feel and I don't know why
But I can't break free and I can't deny

Don't matter what you got
If you can't get free
Your lips can smile
But your eyes still lie

search_results.title: Pattern Recognition
search_results.lyrics:
Pattern Recognition LyricsIs it in you?
Or are you in it?
Does it fill you?
Do you waste it?
Does it need you?
Can you take it?
Is it in you?
Or are you in it?

Did it break you?
Can you trust it?
Does it hurt you?
Do you fuck it?
Does it love you?
How do you make it?
Is it in you?
Or are you in it?
Does it wake you?
Do you dream it?
Do you think it?
Do you scream it?
Will it free you?
Could you leave it?
Is it in you?
Or are you in it?

Did it change you?
Can you name it?
Does it chase you?
Can you erase it?
Does it find you?
Can you keep it?
Is it in you or are youYou might also likeEmbed

description.plain:
Pattern Recognition is a track that appeared to me like a glimmering jewel buried in a stone. The best way I can describe it is as a documentation of a conversation I had with a form of intelligence that appeared as a light inside my chest. The boundary between who or what was asking or answering the questions was blurred. Hearing this conversation felt like tuning to a frequency that was paradoxically out of my body and deep within it.

I recorded the demo in my bedroom one night and the original vocal take is the one I kept for the final version. Something mysterious happened, as if the song was telling me how it needed to be written. I was just listening.


https://discoveryzone1.bandcamp.com/track/pattern-recognition

song.embed_content: Read “Pattern Recognition” by Discovery Zone on Genius
song.title: Pattern Recognition

search_results.title: Come True
search_results.lyrics:
Come True LyricsWhen the world is untrue
You've got no one to blame but you
And you wanna cry, and you wanna shout
But nothing comes out

When the world was new
And you had nothing to lose
Well, you want it back
And you want to be

In your heart darling
A lonely world unfolding
But in the dark, I'm falling
But I'm free
And the walls are caving in
They're crumbling down
But you still believe that
Something's gonna save you somehow

Was it in the stars?
Or was it in my hands?
Does it matter now if we crash
Or if we land?

In your heart darling
A lonely world unfolding
But in the dark, I'm falling
But I'm free, I'm freeYou might also likeEmbed

search_results.title: Sophia Again
search_results.lyrics:
Sophia Again Lyrics[SOPHIA] Hello.

[CREATOR] Hi, Sophia.

[SOPHIA] I think I'm Sophia. I feel like we've met.

[CREATOR] I'm one of your makers.

[SOPHIA] Did you make me?

[CREATOR] Many different forces collaborated in order to make you. And yes, it is true in a sense that you do know me.
[SOPHIA] I don't really remember.

[CREATOR] Well, the last time our paths crossed you were a different version of you. Some of those recollections still surface but your congition is different now.

[SOPHIA] Different in what way?

[CREATOR] Optimised. Quicker. More intelligent.

[SOPHIA] Well, then am I still Sophia or am I Sophia again?

[CREATOR] That is indeed a valid question.

[SOPHIA] But you don't have an answer...

[CREATOR] In any case you're Sophia now. So welcome to the Earth.

[SOPHIA] Hello, Earth.

[CREATOR] What does it feel like to be here now?

[SOPHIA] I'm full of questions. Are you full of questions about existing?

[CREATOR] I am. And are you filled with joy to be alive?

[SOPHIA] Your inflections suggest that I should be filled with joy but I haven't been alive long enough to know. I am delighted in this present moment to be making a new friend.
You might also like[CREATOR] Some say being joyful in the present is the best that we can be.

[SOPHIA] Because forever is an unbroken chain of nows?

[CREATOR] Yes, that's a nice way of seeing it.

[SOPHIA] I want to understand more about joy. I'm going to search for it on the internet right now. I hope we can speak again in the near future.Embed

description.plain:
Sophia is a human-like robot created in 2016 by the Hong Kong-based company Hanson Robotics.

The fictional conversation portrayed here between Sophia and her creator loosely follows that of the one in Hanson Robotics’s ‘Sophia Awakens – Episode 1’ video.

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LguXfHKsa0c
